snippet: The five-member American team at the 42nd Chess Olympiad included three players who were recruited from other countries....
lead_paragraph: The five-member American team at the 42nd Chess Olympiad included three players who were recruited from other countries.

headline.main: U.S. Wins Gold at Chess Olympiad With Help of Imported Talent
headline.print_headline: With Talent Imported, U.S. Wins Rare Gold
